StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegeVisit]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN
SELECT CV.[CollegeVisitID],[SCHOOL_CODE],[CollegeVisitName],[CollegeVisitDesc], [VisitDate] ,[ContactName],[Telephone] ,[Results] FROM [mcriss].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] CV INNER JOIN [mcriss].[USMC].[CollegeVisit] CVD ON CV.CollegeVisitID = CVD.CollegeVisitID and CV.SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
